The mention of specific tournament management (World Adventure Golf Tour) suggests ongoing operational needs for event software.

While no direct procurement requests are visible, the technical debt and reliance on external vendors for event results indicate a potential need for digital transformation or vendor consolidation, which aligns with the broader WMF ecosystem analysis.
